Meanwhile, you can use additionalStrings input to define daylight saving time. Here is two examples. RunPeriodControl:DaylightSavingTime,
    2nd Sunday in March, !- Start Date
    1st Sunday in November; !- End Date RunPeriodControl:DaylightSavingTime,
    3/2, !- Start Date month/date
   10/5; !- End Date month/date [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/l0-9MwVwNFH4TWgWE7yon7GvG6s6GsU9FVlrfYhwUqDjJY9lDcJAqOzJxCbrANIcyMVr9swenju2rkPMQTP1z1LnXf-5m3Le/daylightSaving.png)
